summary:
• Workday consultant specializing in Absence Management & Time Tracking; also certified with HCM Core, Advanced Reporting, and Launch methodology
• Experience in overall Workday functional areas, data purging, and M&A project management & operating model design from HCM perspective

Interested in the implications of technology innovation on human life and business operations, I strive to implement technology solutions to bring transformation and enable business potentials. I dedicate myself, as a young professional, to not only realize my freedom to create, but also master the art of harmonization.

profile_positions.description:
M&A and divestment projects
• Coordinated 6 acquisitions projects across 9 countries during due diligence and post-acquisition integration
• Designed the 1st divestment operating model and runbook for Philips global HR work streams to standardize approach
• Facilitated communication among the M&A team, CoE, and local HR to prepare performance management and Workday training materials; implemented two phased communication to help employees from newly acquired companies integrate smoothly
• Tracked overall status and interdependencies on a weekly basis and reported to management 

HR analytics
• Built KPI dashboard and analyzed performance metrics of all workstreams each quarter, later translated into business case 
• Implemented pulse surveys and OCAI culture surveys, further analysing data to identify engagement challenges, risks, and executable strategies
